QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Tanaris!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Kelsey Steelspark in Gadgetzan.$B$BThe Alliance needs your help to win concessions from the local baron and access to the area's priceless resources. You can reach Gadgetzan by traveling south from the Shimmering Deep in Thousand Needles.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Kelsey Steelspark at Gadgetzan in Tanaris.
